title: Shit Bandit
overview: A mysterious young lad (Doug) is accused of a string of serial breaks ins, where the perpetrator shits on the floor of the home. This tale takes you through hell and back as Doug tries to prove his innocence to everyone around him!

title: The "Perfect" Murder
overview: When April's best friends show up for her surprise birthday party, Reginald has to put his plans of disposing of April's body on hold.

title: Una Pausa Para La Eternidad
overview: A father sees live how his son becomes the protagonist of a TV program.

title: Unakkagathane
overview: Rishi and Shan is very close friend since childhood. After grown up both of them involved in same business as property consultant. Shan fall in love with Nisha, his friend from college and spent time with her. Shan really trusted Rishi and let him deal the biggest land sale. Rishi become greedy and try to cheat Shan with huge amount of commissions which belongs to Shan.Shan is very upset and angry with what have done by Rishi but he never take any action thinking both of them are very close friend since small age.One day one guy was shot dead by police in struggle, who involved in drugs shipments. Brother of dead person known as K7, who is leader of the international syndicate which is most wanted by police.When Rishi collide with K7,he wanted to killed and take revenge.

title: Emeralds for Andrew
overview: When Minecraft Andrew demands his emeralds, YodaFan68 must pay him back...the only problem: he's broke as a joke! Out of desperation, he decides to rob a bank. Filmed entirely in Minecraft.

title: Queen of the Trap House 2: Taking the Throne
overview: Kionna has taken full control of her dead boyfriend's drug empire. She has taken the throne to become the official Queen of the Trap House. However, a new man steps into her life causing her to shift focus away from the criminal enterprise. Kionna also begins dealing with new enemies from rival drug gangs to law enforcement. She will now need to maintain control of her personal life as well as her life of crime. Things soon spiral out of control and her empire begins to crumble. Kionna will now need to show everyone what a true Queen does to maintain power.

belongs_to_collection.name: Queen of the Trap House Collection

title: Valiyor Silar
overview: The struggle between a youngster and a cop. When the policeman snatches the youngster's money, he must find a unique way to get his money back.

title: Life of A Zoe
overview: Attempting to overcome a long period of estrangement, two friends embark on a dangerous journey in the hopes of bettering their lives.

title: Blood Feud
overview: Two brothers morals collide so fiercely that they find themselves at each other's throats.

title: Faded Leather
overview: An unnerving glimpse into the near future is experienced through Callum, a young drifter.

title: Disencumber
overview: Out of options and out of cash, two best friends - a jaded wannabe filmmaker and an idealistic PhD candidate - contemplate robbing their drug dealer.

title: A.D.A.M
overview: In a not too distant future, in the Republic of Chile, the young detective Joyce Nova fulfills her functions in a thin line between law, morality and her particular vision of justice: after having suffered a horrendous crime firsthand and seeing the criminal be protected by the political power in office, her idealization of a just world has become dark and punctual. The closest thing to justice and criminal punishment, for Joyce, will be revenge.

title: The Dentist
overview: A down-on-his-luck dentist of the Wild West is held up by a gunslinging crook, or so it seems.
tagline: The dentist is broke and can only offer help with the robber's infected tooth. But it's not that simple.

title: WHEN MY SKULL HITS CONCRETE
overview: Notorious serial killer "The Sniffler" is desperately trying to leave his dark past behind and make a genuine friend, but his quest for redemption is constantly derailed by Kyle Connor, a bumbling, hopelessly inept detective who’s determined to bring him to justice—no matter how many times he stumbles along the way.
tagline: When redemption calls, can a sinner answer?

title: POISON
overview: A young officer manages to infiltrate a gang of kidnappers and while waiting for the strike force to go into action, she is forced to intervene. Alone and without support, she must decide if, in order to save one life, she must first end many.  A strong woman in a violent world, police forces and defend the good at any cost. When the Law has a lethal side... is it Law?
tagline: The Deadly Side of the Law

title: Maggie Campbell
overview: A murdered woman's spirit, seeking retribution, confronts her killer when he returns to the scene of his crime.

title: Fake Shot
overview: Two musicians brothers face the mob.

title: The Two Dans
overview: "Scary" Perry Caravello, star of the Comedy Central cult classic "Windy City Heat" investigates a murder he believes was perpetrated by comedian Don Barris.

title: Ryan's Story
overview: An interactive film where the viewer get's to make choices for Ryan, a young boy groomed into the drug gang business in his local area. Loosely based on true events

title: Enter The Mirror
overview: Two young men get involved with a high stakes poker game, and scamming their way out.

title: Blind ermittelt: Tod an der Donau
overview: Where there is one corpse, there can also be another! As if Haller knew it, he continued to search near where a shot woman was found. In fact, Haller's "eye" Niko and Inspector Laura find another dead person in the bushes.

title: Nihon Tōitsu Gaiden: Yamazaki Ichimon 9 ~Yonimokimyōna Yamazaki Ichimon~
overview: Himuro and Tamura have prepared a separate house for Kawatani. The Yamazaki family heads to the house for field verification, but they are caught up in a series of horrifying events.

title: Casino
overview: Nirob plays the character of a detective police officer whereas Bubly as a Casino girl.

title: Hver drap Friðrik Dór?
overview: Villi Neto investigates the potential death of singer Friðrik Dór. On his hunt for truth Villi discovers that the conspiracy is much larger and deeper than anyone could have suspected.

title: Last Testament
overview: Following years of abuse while being raised in the Children Of God cult, Ricky Rodriguez seeks revenge against the cult's leader - his mother.

title: Nathicharami
overview: Happily married couple with generous nature has a rock-solid future. Money can’t buy love yet it has a price. Proving love an each other may cost lives. Struggles of a houswife happened during Y2K Rush.

title: The Last Ride of the Wolves
overview: Pasquale, an old crook who lost his fortune to gambling, organizes his last big heist and reunites The Wolves, a gang of North-Italian fairground operators who moonlight as thieves. The robbery of a money truck - transporting 12 million euros in cash - could be a good pension for everybody, and secure the legacy of their old-school craftsmanship.

title: shadowed intentions
overview: Under the cover of night, a mysterious figure steals a briefcase filled with cash and a cryptic letter. As the enigmatic events unfold, secrets unravel, lives are shattered, and a truth emerges, leaving a trail of deception and despair in its wake.

title: Loyalty
overview: When independent drug dealer, Buttons, learns his girlfriend used to be his competitor, T Bones, longtime side chick, and believes they might still be messing around, it's on. T Bones' family is strong and makes sure no one crosses them by any means.

title: The Puppet Who Knew Too Much
overview: When a curious crime occurs, a detective needs to race against the clock to prevent your prime suspect from becoming an assassin from the future.

title: Four Amigos
overview: Ace's mother needs expensive medical treatment to cure her disease. In despair, "The Four Amigos" decide to rob a drug lord to save Ace's mother.
tagline: Four friends, a dying parent and 5 million dollars.

title: Deceit
overview: Nacho gets involved in organized crime, a war of drug cartels is looming. Nacho must decide if he goes ahead or looks for a way out.

title: The Call
overview: A reckless civilian finds himself in an accident.

title: The Sharpie
overview: When what should be a straightforward blackmailing goes amiss, The Sharpie finds the tables have been turned when she herself is held to ransom. This silent thriller starring Patricia Allison (Sex Education) will keep you guessing right up until the last shot.

title: Birth of a Feminine Nation
overview: A detective investigates the mystery of a woman that claims some invention was stolen from her.

title: Lesbian Psycho
overview: Two new media journalists get on track of a murder case in a psychiatric clinic. The outcome stuns them.

title: Horacio
overview: Guillaume kills Horacio "because he was shouting too loud." At his trial, the vacuity of the motive disconcerts. During his 10-year-long stay in prison, Guillaume gradually forgets this story of a guy shouting too loud which convinces no one. When he gets out, someone starts shouting again.

title: Winner Takes All: Royal Flush
overview: A movie within the The Haunting of Prince Dom Pedro feature film, Winner Takes All: Royal Flush is the latest sequel in the wildly successful Winner Takes All series about a shadowy billionaire and his loyal accomplice who swindle the world's best out of their hard-earned winnings. This time around, it's a high stakes game of poker.
tagline: The odds have never been higher.

title: Folk Fiction
overview: A seemingly typical village is thrust into the spotlight due to an unforeseen murder, Can Detective Richard Head and his Assistant Scott Cheg solve the murder case of Poppy Clogs.  This is one of Jack Bryant's earliest films, and was made for his Extended Project Qualification at Sixth Form.
tagline: Unravel the Folk Mystery Where Legends Live and Die...

title: WayWard Manor
overview: Short reversal of fortune film.  Check it out on youtube on my channel AdamKilshawe
tagline: Its not what it seems in wayward manor

title: Dress Code
overview: Bobby Russo was born into a life of organized crime. From early on, he learned many lessons from his family, including loyalty, respect, and honor. He learned secrets can be dangerous. All grown up, Bobby now realizes that the most dangerous secrets are his own.
tagline: The truth doesn't always set you free.

title: Out of the Hood
overview: When Jason Todd spots an innocent girl be followed by a dangerous thug, he suits up to fight the scum.

title: Takeout
overview: Lorenzo Vincenzo (Clive Coe) is an Italian gangster who loves Chinese culture. When his right-hand man Elio (Elia Riebel) gets into a mix-up with an old friend, chaos unfolds.
tagline: You Dim Sum, you lose sum

title: A Grain Of Salt
overview: Amidst a political campaign to represent his people in a post-WWII British Government, a Punjabi community leader faces unexpected opposition from a member of his own flesh and blood.

title: Ghungroo
overview: A tale revolving around an influential man who falls in love with a dancer. Even though their love is ostracized by the society, they raise a child who goes on to become a service officer.

title: PPP Loan Gone
overview: A worldwide pandemic has struck causing small businesses of all natures to struggle keeping their open signs, up and lit. That is until the government created a loan for these businesses that is totally forgivable with requirements.

title: Makin Moves
overview: No matter how hard you try to make it out the streets, something always tries to pull you back in.

title: Untitled
overview: A protestor is kidnapped by the police and asked to use is influence to sway the protests in the governments way.

title: Night Cafe
overview: The film follows an ensemble of colorful characters at a restaurant who experience an eventful night while a waitress's shift goes from bad to worse.

title: UK's Hidden Shadows
overview: UK's Hidden Shadows is a new documentary examining the recent history of allegations of child abuse and cover-ups within the British establishment. Filmed over the course of a year, the 90-minute documentary features interviews with victims of child abuse, journalists and police whistle-blowers. Each interview offers a unique insight into the alleged Westminster VIP paedophile ring that has darkened politics for the last five decades.

title: Chosen Few
overview: Abhay Joshi, a young, bright Special Police Officer (SPO) conducts a police raid on a dingy hotel in the suburbs of Mumbai. Though the police arrest few prostitutes along with their customers in the disgusting small rooms of the hotel, Abhay seems disappointed. He had information about a graver crime. Just then, he hears a muffled scream. He spots a thin boy escaping from beneath the hotel. Few minor girls run behind him. By the time police reaches the secret door, the boy and the girls disappear into the narrow lanes. .

title: The Dynty Heist
overview: A group of 6 marksman prepare to rob a bank of The Dynty institute. After taking hostages they find complications within the bank and themselves.

title: The Spider's Web
overview: The three Alvarez brothers Luís, Emilio, and Davíd struggle to keep their narcotics operation afloat while being relentlessly hunted by the DEA. Little do his two older brothers know, but Davíd’s double life as an informant for the DEA will reveal the hidden layers of guilt, greed, and ambition within their brotherhood.

title: Charade Invasion
overview: Two devious teenagers attempt to invade school to change a grade and save their summer.
tagline: Summer can not be a bummer

title: You and i
overview: Harry, an obsessive sociopath in the 9th grade, watches as his ex-girlfriend starts dating a new student. This combined with his bitter feelings about the end of their relationship causes him to loose control and do anything in his power to get her back.  Including removing the competition.
tagline: How far would you go for love?

title: How to Catch a Cat Killer
overview: This documentary tells the story of how sleuthing cat owners in Brighton came together to catch an unknown killer who was preying on much-loved pets across the South Coast.

title: Mordkommission Calw - Klassentreffen
overview: A supermarket is robbed. Commissioner Karl Jäger, who happens to be present, shoots the robber and is subsequently suspended from duty because the attacker’s weapon is not found. The incident also plunges Jäger into deep psychological problems. As a result, commissioners Lola Kraft and Jasmin Stein are called in when two bodies are discovered during the night of a class reunion at the Calw Hermann Hesse High School. All 29 party guests are considered suspects. When the investigators find out that their suspended colleague was a former classmate, his memories help advance the solution to the case, which has its origins in their school days.

title: Great Seeing You
overview: Two friends meet each other after a long time - but not in the way they expected.

production_companies.name: CTR - Departamento de Cinema, Rádio e TV

title: A Venice Beach Story (Proof of Concept)
overview: Under the belief that they are Bonnie and Clyde reincarnated, a young couple violently targets tourists on the Venice Beach Boardwalk in the name of art.

title: Danger Bucks
overview: Sometimes, all money isn't good money. Nori and Derek will find out the hard way when the wrong package causes destruction. Meanwhile, Lucky owes Kobra money but finds out his dad left him and his siblings a large lump sum that changes everything.

title: Similar Suspects
overview: Dr. Wilson's murder leaves detectives confused when similar suspects are sought out.

title: The Bloodville Massacre
overview: A tribute to German splatter films of the 1980s-2000s. A horror movie fanatic hunts down a couple of people in his town Blutville.

title: Bachibar Holo Tar Sadh
overview: A mafia family is left empty due to the sudden suicide of the mafia boss's younger brother. But when someone very close creates a wound, is revenge the solution?

title: High & Dry
overview: A dark comedy, High & Dry tells a story of a college student accidentally running into two ferocious drug dealers and eventually unmasking the master behind the curtain…

title: Deep Blue
overview: After witnessing a horrific event, one man risks everything in an effort to help a stranger.

title: Money for Andrew
overview: Dude has to give Andrew 500 bucks by the end of the hour. Filmed in one hour in New Jersey.

title: Eggshells
overview: A short film about domestic abuse (coercive control, gaslighting, domestic violence).

title: LISTEN
overview: Utah student athlete Lauren McCluskey's murder by Melvin Rowland made national news. As documented in LISTEN, the people and the institutions responsible for protecting her failed at every turn.

title: Stick Me Up
overview: Held hostage in a diner, ten very different people, learn they have more in common than it appears.

title: Agent Mambo: True Pac
overview: Dyulus and Afonya are ordinary country guys who love rap and cool cars. During the day they work in the boiler room, in the evenings they record their album and every day they dream of a better life. Especially Afonya, nicknamed Appos, who dreams of dumping into the city, believing that real life is passing by. His comrade Dyulus, nicknamed Trupak, on the contrary, is not eager to leave his native village. But one day, Dyulus receives a letter that radically changes his life and makes him leave for the city, towards fate...

title: Breathe
overview: After a car accident, a young man wakes up tied to a chair in a basement. Will he be able to escape, or will he succumb to his wounds?

title: Blasé L.A.
overview: BLASÉ L.A. is about an ambitious teenager that moves to Los Angeles to complete his last year of high school and reconnect with his estranged father. While there, he creates a new identity for himself in order to run with the popular clique at the school. The film is a time capsule of the selfie-obsessed millennial cultured world of Los Angeles.

title: Exeter at Midnight
overview: An aging hitman is forced to come out of retirement for one more job, despite his current deteriorating mental condition.

title: Scratched Nail
overview: A paranoid man is forced to deal with the aftermath of a bloody murder.

title: Connected
overview: The story of Genaro Costelli, a young man growing up in a neighborhood that is controlled by the Mafia. Despite the teachings of his family and church, he is tempted by the extravagant and seemingly care-free lifestyle of his "friends". The lure of mystery, power and intrigue are to powerful for Genaro to resist and he soon finds himself caught up in a web of danger, contradiction and betrayal. After suffering personal and family sacrifice he must face the most difficult challenge of his life, that is, how to live free of the tenacious life-long grip of the mob. Add to this the love of a young woman he is trying to protect and how he must choose between his love for her and his obligations to the mob.

title: Los amantes
overview: Between his heart and mine, there was one step and the doubt of whether one step was enough.

title: Halfpace
overview: When a bed-ridden teen discovers his online crush has been murdered, he investigates her death, leading him on a hunt to stop her killer before he strikes again.
tagline: Don't Let Her Know the Truth

title: Kings Of Astoria
overview: From indie filmmaking partners Giuseppe and Giacomo Davi comes a new, startlingly original take on the mob movie genre. Freshly released from prison after being arrested at the young age of 16, former crime boss Giuseppe Todd has to come to terms and grow with a crime family that's moved on without him.

title: Mint Tea
overview: A police team made up of a detective and a journalist and led by an expert chief detective investigate a mysterious crime that appears to be perfect.

title: Guerra tra bande - Gang latine a Milano
رفعت الجلسة
overview: One year after lawyer Younis Abdel Rahman committed suicide due to the murder of his son Fahd, a mysterious killer appears who commits a series of serial crimes in revenge for the child, leaving no evidence behind except a necklace in the shape of a scorpion.

title: The Good Monkey Job
overview: Six unlikely companions must work together to steal a mystical artifact: the Golden Monkey

title: Encoberto
overview: Vargas is an undercover agent whose mission is to capture a group of robbers. The robbery of a jewelry store will be the ideal moment to catch them in the act. After a conversation with Ricardo, one of the group's members, Vargas questions his view of the enemy, making the mission much more difficult.

title: Tender
overview: Two former law school classmates decide to go into tenders and public procurement, but for a number of reasons they begin to supply goods in a not entirely legal way.

title: D for Die
overview: Under the name of religion, we have marketed colours, faiths, and, moreover, our precious lives. white has one such; Who creates such distinction? Thousands of years ago, someone made some rules that were appropriate at the time. Still, we are hanging on to the same theory and fighting among ourselves under disharmony.  It's our honest effort to throw some light on religious disharmony by using personification as a tool.  It's our life!! Let's Live!!!! Let them live because its "their Life" also!!!!
tagline: What can be religion, if it does not have kindness - Basavanna

title: Chain-Link
overview: In order to escape a prison under constant and total surveillance, a jaded clone and a sensitive art forger must strike an uneasy alliance with their malevolent AI surveiller. Along the way they encounter a sentient program enslaved in the prison’s lab-grown meat farm, a tormented being who may hold the key to their escape.

title: Vengeance Served Cold
overview: A 15 year old Madison watched her mother be murdered by a local pimp. As an adult, she takes justice into her own hands to get revenge on her mother's killer.
tagline: A grief-stricken woman takes justice into her own hands to get revenge on her mother's killer.

title: Sleigher 2
overview: Santa and Patty clash heads again in the thrilling sequel.
